body:
This is a fairly common issue that I think is worth documenting: See #267, #1909, #2053, #2070, #2546, #2590, #4312, etc.

I think the change I made to the R package actually prevents this problem? (although the variant resolution mechanism is still broken). But all of the following commands work for me now:
```
$ spack spec r
$ spack spec r+X
$ spack spec r~X
```
@hartzell @samfux84 can you test this?

@tgamblin can you confirm that my diagnosis of the problem is accurate?
title: Document known issue with R concretization
